name: ##anarchism
body:
* [##anarchism][] is a place to discuss revolutionary ideas in a mature way.
* [##anarchism][] is a safe space for oppressed minorities to talk without fear of derailment, marginalization or silencing.
* [##anarchism][] is a small but active community which uses rough consensus when possible.

### Useful reading

* [How to Be An Ally](http://genderbitch.wordpress.com/2009/09/22/how-to-be-an-ally/)
* [Pseudo-Ally Tears And Why We Don't Care](http://genderbitch.wordpress.com/2010/01/27/pseudoally-tears-and-tone/)
* We're still writing an officially codified Anti-Oppression Policy.

[##anarchism]: irc://irc.freenode.net/%23%23anarchism
